common.tagline: Your Smart Agricultural Chemical Procurement Partner

auth.inquireLoginDesc: Please log in to your account to make product inquiries to suppliers
auth.cartLoginDesc: Please log in to your account to add products to cart
auth.sampleLoginDesc: Please log in to your account to request product samples from suppliers
auth.inquiryAccessDesc: Please log in to your account to view and manage your inquiry records
auth.inquiryLoginMessage: Inquiry management features require login. Please log in to your account to view and manage your inquiry records.

buyer.title: Buyer Dashboard
buyer.subtitle: Smart Procurement Management, Efficient Business Collaboration

management.inquiryDesc: Publish procurement inquiries and track quotation progress
management.productsDesc: Maintain procurement catalog and manage requirement lists
management.suppliersDesc: Manage supplier relationships and evaluate partners
management.ordersDesc: Track procurement orders and manage delivery progress
management.samplesDesc: Request product samples and track sample status
management.contractsDesc: Handle procurement contracts and manage legal documents
management.favoritesDesc: Bookmark products and suppliers of interest

empty.noMessagesDesc: System messages and business notifications will appear here
empty.noProductsDesc: Based on your procurement preferences, we will recommend suitable products

supplier.title: Supplier Dashboard
supplier.subtitle: Manage your business and expand cooperation opportunities

products.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your search keywords or filters
products.errorLoadingDesc: Network error, please try again later

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.emptyDesc: Go and select your favorite agricultural products!
cart.operationNote: Batch operations require selecting products from the same supplier

inquiryDialog.description: Submit inquiry requests for selected products

inquiry.searchPlaceholder: Search inquiry no., supplier or product...
inquiry.searchSupplierPlaceholder: Search inquiry no., buyer or product...

inquiry.notFoundDesc: The inquiry you're looking for may have been deleted or doesn't exist

inquiry.messageSuccessDesc: Your message has been sent to the recipient
inquiry.messageFailedDesc: Please check your network connection and try again

inquiry.noQuoteDesc: The supplier has not provided a quote yet, please wait or send a reminder

companyNotAssociated.title: Company authentication required
companyNotAssociated.description: Your account is not associated with a company and cannot access this feature. Please complete the company authentication process first.

invalidCompanyType.title: Company type mismatch
invalidCompanyType.description: Your company type cannot access this feature. This feature is only available to specific types of companies.

accessDenied.title: Insufficient access permissions
accessDenied.description: You do not have permission to access this resource. This may be because you are not a relevant business participant.

onlyBuyer.title: Buyers only
onlyBuyer.description: This feature is only available to buyers. If you are a supplier, please use the appropriate supplier functions.

onlySupplier.title: Suppliers only
onlySupplier.description: This feature is only available to suppliers. If you are a buyer, please use the appropriate buyer functions.

generic.title: Insufficient permissions
generic.description: You temporarily cannot access this feature, please check your account permission settings.

PERMISSION_COMPANY_NOT_ASSOCIATED.title: Company authentication feature requires company authentication
PERMISSION_COMPANY_NOT_ASSOCIATED.message: Accessing company authentication features requires completing company authentication first. Please fill in company information to complete the authentication process.

DATA_NOT_FOUND.title: Data not found
DATA_NOT_FOUND.message: The related data information was not found. Please check the request parameters or try again.

API_ENDPOINT_NOT_FOUND.title: API endpoint not found
API_ENDPOINT_NOT_FOUND.message: The requested API endpoint does not exist. The server may not have implemented this functionality yet. Please contact technical support.

NETWORK_CONNECTION_ERROR.title: Network connection failed
NETWORK_CONNECTION_ERROR.message: Unable to connect to company authentication service. Please check your network connection and try again.

PERMISSION_ACCESS_DENIED.title: Access to company authentication denied
PERMISSION_ACCESS_DENIED.message: You do not have permission to access this company authentication feature. Please contact the administrator.

AUTH_UNAUTHORIZED.title: Login Required
AUTH_UNAUTHORIZED.message: You need to log in to access inquiry management features.

AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED.title: Login Expired
AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED.message: Your login session has expired, please log in again to continue using inquiry features.

PERMISSION_COMPANY_NOT_ASSOCIATED.title: Inquiry feature requires company authentication
PERMISSION_COMPANY_NOT_ASSOCIATED.message: Accessing inquiry management features requires completing company authentication first. Please go to company settings to complete the authentication process.

PERMISSION_INVALID_COMPANY_TYPE.title: Company type does not meet requirements
PERMISSION_INVALID_COMPANY_TYPE.message: Your company type cannot access inquiry features. Please contact customer service for detailed requirements.

PERMISSION_ACCESS_DENIED.title: No access to this inquiry
PERMISSION_ACCESS_DENIED.message: You do not have permission to view this inquiry information. Only related buyers or suppliers can access it.

SUBSCRIPTION_NOT_FOUND.title: Inquiry Service Not Activated
SUBSCRIPTION_NOT_FOUND.message: Your account has not activated the inquiry service. Please contact customer service to activate this feature.

SUBSCRIPTION_EXPIRED.title: Inquiry Service Expired
SUBSCRIPTION_EXPIRED.message: Your inquiry service has expired. Please renew to continue using this feature.

SUBSCRIPTION_REQUIRED.title: Inquiry Service Activation Required
SUBSCRIPTION_REQUIRED.message: Using inquiry features requires service activation. Please contact customer service for details.

BUSINESS_VALIDATION_ERROR.title: Data Validation Failed
BUSINESS_VALIDATION_ERROR.message: The submitted data does not meet requirements. Please check your input and try again.

DATA_NOT_FOUND.title: Inquiry does not exist
DATA_NOT_FOUND.message: The inquiry you are looking for may have been deleted or does not exist, please check if the inquiry number is correct.

NETWORK_CONNECTION_ERROR.title: Network connection failed
NETWORK_CONNECTION_ERROR.message: Unable to connect to the server, please check your network connection and try again.

PERMISSION_COMPANY_NOT_ASSOCIATED.title: Company association required
PERMISSION_COMPANY_NOT_ASSOCIATED.message: Your account is not associated with a company and cannot use this feature.

PERMISSION_INVALID_COMPANY_TYPE.title: Company type mismatch
PERMISSION_INVALID_COMPANY_TYPE.message: Your company type cannot access this feature.

PERMISSION_ACCESS_DENIED.title: Access denied
PERMISSION_ACCESS_DENIED.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.

AUTH_UNAUTHORIZED.title: Authentication failed
AUTH_UNAUTHORIZED.message: Your login status has expired, please log in again.

DATA_NOT_FOUND.title: Data does not exist
DATA_NOT_FOUND.message: The content you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.

API_ENDPOINT_NOT_FOUND.title: API endpoint not found
API_ENDPOINT_NOT_FOUND.message: The requested functionality is not yet available. Please contact technical support or try again later.

NETWORK_CONNECTION_ERROR.title: Network connection failed
NETWORK_CONNECTION_ERROR.message: Unable to connect to the server, please check your network connection.

UNKNOWN_ERROR.title: Unknown error
UNKNOWN_ERROR.message: An unknown error occurred, please try again later.

SUBSCRIPTION_NOT_FOUND.title: Service Not Activated
SUBSCRIPTION_NOT_FOUND.message: Your account has not activated this service. Please contact customer service to activate it.

SUBSCRIPTION_EXPIRED.title: Service Expired
SUBSCRIPTION_EXPIRED.message: Your service has expired. Please renew to continue using it.

BUSINESS_VALIDATION_ERROR.title: Data Validation Failed
BUSINESS_VALIDATION_ERROR.message: The submitted data does not meet requirements. Please check and try again.

BUSINESS_OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED.title: Operation Not Allowed
BUSINESS_OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED.message: This operation cannot be performed in the current state.

AUTH_UNAUTHORIZED.title: Login Required
AUTH_UNAUTHORIZED.message: You need to log in to access this feature.

AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED.title: Login Expired
AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED.message: Your login session has expired, please log in again.

AUTH_INVALID_CREDENTIALS.title: Login Failed
AUTH_INVALID_CREDENTIALS.message: Username or password is incorrect, please try again.
